column2: title=Selections from the Marquette J.R.R. Tolkien Collection
image=[[Image:Selections from the Marquette J.R.R. Tolkien Collection.png

column1: '''''Selections from the Marquette J.R.R. Tolkien Collection''''' is an exhibition catalogue from the [[Marquette University
column2: Marquette University Library]]. The catalogue includes three essays on works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: *"Mr Bliss: Notes on the Manuscript and Story" (by [[Jared Lobdell
*"The Boundaries of the Little Kingdom" (by [[Taum Santoski]])
*"A Tale that Grew in the Telling" (by [[Verlyn Flieger]])

Of note is the inclusion of a sentence by Tolkien that was removed from the typescript of ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' prior to typesetting (p. 15).<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=66000 Selections from the Marquette J.R.R. Tolkien Collection.1987] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 27 October 2011)</ref>
